jobInfo.postDescription:
Android软件工程师
at Eureka Studios Ltd. 
Beijing, China
Eureka Studios is an IT company that connects the world through art and technology. By combining fun and creativity, we provide an entertaining experience to everyone.
•  MomentCam allows you to create funny personalized Cartoons from your photos and share them on social media. With over 200 million downloads, MomentCam has transformed how people chat by giving everyone their own personal emoji avatar.
•  Our Official Video: ⋐-⋑链接存在风险---⋐-⋑链接存在风险----------------------

•  MojiPop is a global communication platform that uses high-end face detection services to create personalized GIF stickers and caricatures. Today’s users want virtual conversations to be tailored to their specific needs, and so MojiPop was created to make the way we communicate with each other more fun and personal. 
Our Official Video: ⋐-⋑链接存在风险---⋐-⋑链接存在风险---------------------- 
We are looking for an Android Engineer to join our Team! Working from our Beijing office, you’ll play a key role in building and shaping apps that millions of users use every day. You will own key features in the MomentCam and the MojiPop applications. If you like solving challenging problems, join us now!



What you'll do:
•  Ability to deal with ambiguity and deliver compelling, well structured products on Android
•  Debugging our applications
•  Develop platform features from design through implementation and launch
•  Object Oriented Programming and publishing Android App updates in the Google Play Store
•  Push the limits of mobile devices and create great user experiences
•  Perform code reviews that guarantee code quality
•  Build smooth, stable, and fun features for millions of users
•  Evaluate technical tradeoffs of every decision and work with design on the best UI and infrastructure practices
•  Learn best practices from other engineers in mobile development 
Minimum qualifications:
•  Bachelor’s degree in computer science or related technical field
•  Excellent written and verbal communications in English. Chinese is also a plus
•  You love Android app development
•  You have worked on multiple android functionalities like AR, GPS, Camera, Push Notifications
•  You have already written several opensource projects in your free time (language does not matter)
•  History of working on complex projects where you have taken more and more responsibility

尤里卡（Eureka Studios）是一家通过艺术和技术将世界联系在一起的IT公司。 通过结合乐趣和创意，我们为每个人提供全新的娱乐体验。

•MomentCam通过您的面部识别创作出有趣的个性化漫画，您可以在社交媒体上分享。 我们已经为每位用户提供了属于自己的漫画形象，改变了传统的聊天方式。下载量超过2亿次


•我们的官方视频 ：⋐-⋑链接存在风险---⋐-⋑链接存在风险----------------------

•MojiPop是一个全球交流平台，利用先进的人脸检测服务来创作个性化的GIF贴纸和漫画。今天，用户希望根据他们的想法进行虚拟对话内容定制，MojiPop的诞生就是为了让我们彼此交流的方式变得更有趣，更个性化。
•我们的官方视频 ：⋐-⋑链接存在风险---⋐-⋑链接存在风险----------------------

我们正在寻找一名安卓工程师加入我们的团队！ 在我们的北京办公室工作，您将在构建和塑造数百万用户每天使用的应用程序中发挥关键作用。 您将在MomentCam和MojiPop应用程序中占有关键位置。 如果你喜欢解决具有挑战性的问题，现在就加入我们吧！

你要做的是:

•能够处理Android上bug问题并提供完美的解决方案和结构良好的软件产品
•调试我们的应用程序 性能和内存优化，善于解决系统崩溃，内存溢出和兼容性问题

•依据平台特性设计，编写，发布程序

•在Google Play等商店发布Android应用程序安装包

•挑战移动设备的性能极限，为用户创造卓越的体验

•进行代码评审以保证代码质量

•为数百万用户构建流畅，稳定和有趣的功能

•提供每个决策的技术权衡，并在最佳UI和基础设施实践上进行软件编程设计

•在软件开发中向其他工程师学习最佳的设计方案

最低资格:

•计算机编程或相关专业本科学历

•优秀的中，英语书面和口头交流能力。 

•喜欢Android应用程序开发

•熟悉Android开发技术，包括常用控件。比如AR，GPS，摄像头，推送通知等
•有几款Android产品开发经验，有创新思维，能够对产品的设计提出建议
•参与过开源项目者优先；有自主开发的成功App应用优先；

at Eureka Studios Ltd.

•	MojiPop is a global communication platform that uses high-end face detection services to create personalized GIF stickers. Today’s users want virtual conversations to be tailored to their specific needs, and so MojiPop was created to make the way we communicate with each other more fun and personal.

•	BBMoji is a companion app to BBM, which allows you to create funny cartoons and stickers from your selfies and photos. You can use and share BBMoji stickers to chat with your friends on BBM.
Our Official Video: https://www.⋐-⋑链接存在风险--/watch?v=JMu7f6tUi-A

You will own key features in the MomentCam, MojiPop and BBMoji applications. If you like solving challenging problems, join us now!
